column4: hi sirs, I see that for breezy there is apache2 and apache2-common, what's the difference please?
just install apache2, and it'll install common with it
but what I did is that I installed apache2-common and now apache seems to work without apache2!!
apache2-common is essential part, but it won't work all ;)
can  you give an example of what won't work?
not really, but I higly advise you to install apache2 as well ;)
ok then I will install apache to make sure apahce would work. funny ;)
ok I will try but why?
mnt is still on the LSB standard, no?
that won't solve your problem, and mnt is not standard I think *anymore*
still same problem after using media
I know, I told you that won't solve your problem ;)
what seems to be your problem exactly? ;)
nothing beside I was about to trash a very valuable partition because of a false report by fdisk -l !!
